Division algorithm
Started 08/31/20



00 STA DIVEDEND
02 STB DIVISOR


04 STD --
06 RCA
07 WBB +11
09 STB 00
0B SLC
0C MBA
0D MCB
0E SLA
0F MCA
10 SAVE B
12 STB --
14 JMPC A<B 2B +?
16 SUB
